original_solution_mapping.L1: He needs to keep his total time at 300 or below because 5 x 60 = <<5*60=300>>300
original_solution_mapping.L2: His total time spent in the other mazes is 200 because 4 x 50 = <<4*50=200>>200
original_solution_mapping.L3: His total time spent in the five mazes thus far is 245 because 200 + 45 = <<200+45=245>>245
original_solution_mapping.L4: He can spend 55 more minutes on this maze before his average go above 60 because 300 - 245 = <<300-245=55>>55

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1313.
    Returns: the maximum additional minutes Frank can spend in the current maze to keep his average at or below 60 minutes per maze.
    """
    # L1
    total_mazes = 5 # 4 other mazes + current maze
    max_avg = 60 # average doesn't go above 60 minutes per maze
    max_total_time = total_mazes * max_avg

    # L2
    other_mazes = 4 # 4 other corn mazes
    avg_other = 50 # finished those in 50 minutes on average
    total_other_time = other_mazes * avg_other

    # L3
    current_time = 45 # already spent 45 minutes inside
    time_so_far = total_other_time + current_time

    # L4
    max_additional_time = max_total_time - time_so_far

    # FA
    answer = max_additional_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He needs to keep his total time at {max_total_time} or below because {total_mazes} x {max_avg} = <<{total_mazes}*{max_avg}={max_total_time}>>{max_total_time}
His total time spent in the other mazes is {total_other_time} because {other_mazes} x {avg_other} = <<{other_mazes}*{avg_other}={total_other_time}>>{total_other_time}
His total time spent in the five mazes thus far is {time_so_far} because {total_other_time} + {current_time} = <<{total_other_time}+{current_time}={time_so_far}>>{time_so_far}

He can spend {max_additional_time} more minutes on this maze before his average go above 60 because {max_total_time} - {time_so_far} = <<{max_total_time}-{time_so_far}={max_additional_time}>>{max_additional_time}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: He can spend 3355 more minutes on this maze before his average go above 60 because 3600 - 245 = <<3600-245=3355>>3355

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'max_avg' (60) was used instead of 'total_mazes' (5).
